name: Rune Finder
description:
Made for LOWREZJAM 2022.  Dive into the depths to find the rune of great power? yeah whatever man just go swing on some vines

Made using:

  •  Godot 4.alpha14
  • FL Studio
  • Procreate

Controls:

  • WASD to Move
  • Space to Jump
  • Shift to Lunge (air-dash)
  • Mouse 1 to grab and hold on
